title: Nerf’s New Spokes-Demon, Texas To Secede … Again 06.22.22
itunes:title: Nerf’s New Spokes-Demon, Texas To Secede … Again 06.22.22
description:
In episode 1273, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, filmmaker, writer and co-host of 1Upsmanship, Michael Swaim, to discuss… Texas GOP had a weird weekend…, MSM hiding / downplaying progressive electoral performance, The New Nerf Macot is Freaking Everybody the F-ck Out and more!

  1. Texas GOP had a weird weekend…
  2. The Democrats Are Fools for Boosting Trumpist Republicans
  3. MSM hiding / downplaying progressive electoral performance
  4. The New Nerf Macot is Freaking Everybody the F-ck Out
  5. Nerf’s New Mascot Murph Will Stalk Your Nightmares
  6. Nerf Has a Nightmarish New Mascot Named Murph
  7. A look inside the ALICE active shooter training taken by Pittsburgh Public Schools administrators
  8. Why Toy Guns Matter

LISTEN: Tombola 94 by Dina Ögon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
